testcase.name: Verification of Login Button with number of credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Open the chrome and launch the application............................passed When Enter the Username "Admin" and Password "admin123".....................passed Then Login to the application...............................................passed And Click on time, attendance and punchInOut................................passed And Enter punch in details "2020-10-21" and "01:00" and "noteIn"............passed And Enter punch out details "2020-10-21" and "02:00" and "noteOut"..........passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
